inclusion.criterion: de novo acromegaly with an elevated age and sex matched IGF-I
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: GH >1ng/ml at all time points during OGTT
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: single random serum hGH of 12.5 ng/ml or greater
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: both the endocrinologist and surgeon agree that the patient's health would not be compromised by a three-month period during which time Octreotide LAR is administered
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patients currently on dopamine agonist who agree to discontinue medication (2-6 week washout required)
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: documented loss of vision due to pituitary tumor
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: prior treatment for acromegaly other than dopamine agonists
exclusion.label: met

notes: The patient has a history of acromegaly and underwent surgery. He is currently taking vitamin D and multivitamins.
